channel.title: HEV voice not correct when announcing your power
channel.description:
Hi,
I had 8 armor power, I received 15, instead of saying 23, it told me 25

item.title: HEV voice not correct when announcing your power
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Serza:

All HEV says is the nearest multiple of five.

This.

item.title: HEV voice not correct when announcing your power
item.dc:creator: Rex_Prime
item.description:
no, it spoke to me about health and energy, maybe you didn’t notice or you got a really nasty bug.

item.source: HEV voice not correct when announcing your power

item.title: HEV voice not correct when announcing your power
item.dc:creator: warpedfreeman
item.description:
Serza:

All HEV says is the nearest multiple of five. Thus it’s perfectly correct. I believe it was so in every Half-Life game up to now. (and actually, I can’t remember the HEV telling me how much power I had left in HL2)

the hev doesnt says the percent count in hl2

Read full topic
